name: Fill (Infinite Puzzles)
description: Infinitely Generated, Infinitely Fun Play an infinite amount of puzzles. Fill all of the Tiles with your color to complete a level. But be careful- you can't cross or land on a filled Tile! Use WASD or the Arrow keys to move. Press the spacebar or "R" key to skip a level. There are 5 Tiles, each different: - When you land on a Blue tile, it turns Pink. - When you land on a Pink tile, it turns Purple. - When you land on a Purple tile, it turns Blank. - When you land on a Blank tile, it is filled. - Landing on a Yellow tile does nothing. Can you complete all of the levels? Just kidding, of course not. There's infinite of them.
